assessments.status_rationale: Today’s news bullets do not mention the BLS publishing (or not publishing) the delayed January 2026 Employment Situation report. Deadline (2026-02-11) has not yet passed.

No bullet provides VIX closing levels. While the news describes a tech rout/crypto slump that could raise volatility, there is no explicit evidence that VIX closed ≥30 on any day, and the deadline (2026-03-31) is in the future.
The bullets reference market declines (e.g., software/tech selling) but do not provide Nasdaq-100 (NDX) close data or year-to-date peak/decline calculations. Deadline (2026-04-30) has not yet passed.
The news includes Amazon’s spending plan but contains no mention of Alphabet/Google guidance or filings indicating 2026 capex ≥$65B. Deadline (2026-04-30) has not yet passed.
No bullet reports BIS adding China-based entities to the Entity List (or the rationale tied to AI/advanced computing/semiconductors). Deadline (2026-05-31) has not yet passed.
There is no mention of an FOMC rate cut relative to the 2026-02-05 target range. Deadline (2026-06-30) has not yet passed.
Today’s bullets do not mention NOAA’s Mauna Loa CO2 monthly average readings or any month at/above 430.0 ppm. Deadline (2026-06-30) has not yet passed.
No bullet references dividend declarations for ARCC, OBDC, FSK, or MAIN, nor any regular dividend cut. Deadline (2026-08-31) has not yet passed.
No bullet reports a ≥$1.0B impairment charge tied primarily to U.S. offshore wind assets/projects for Ørsted, Equinor, BP, Avangrid, or RWE. Deadline (2026-08-31) has not yet passed.
